title: Shooter at large at Florida high school
text:
Shooter at large at Florida high school 3:53pm EST - 00:28 
At least 20 people were injured when a gunman opened fire at a Florida high school, local media reported, with dozens of police and emergency officials surrounding the building while students fled with their arms in the air. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
